data.name: A Sex Slave's  Love Story
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’˜CHECK THIS OUT!ðŸ’˜

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1571820/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1778330/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870310/


About the Game

â—†Featured Systems

â—‡Full CG mode can be turned on in the environment setting, and HCG can be freely browsed.
â—‡Pressure-Free Operation Support one-click mouse operation-Fast text-to-text system

â—†Story


Her name is Qian Xiangxiang, is a woman from the golden manor. She has no many interests, sex, is one of them.

This golden manor is set up to please the men of high society, men can pay money to come to the golden manor, play the role of chauffeur, butler, chef, florist, and even the male master and other roles, like a big family to live in peace with everyone, and every woman can be seen to have intercourse at will.

Qian Xiangxiang is blessed with the status of "Missy" in the manor. She is sweet looking and good at sex, and is at ease in this environment, living a life of indulgence and lust with the men every day, and reporting her lustful behavior to the master of the manor to please him.

The owner of the manor, the head of the Qian family, Qian Ronghao, considers Qian Xiangxiang as his adopted daughter because of her unique charm and gives her a goal in life: to marry a son of one of the four major enterprises, so as to bring the Qian family closer to the other enterprises.

Qian Xiangxiang thus meets her destiny, Ted Carter, the son of the Carter family of the Big Five. As a woman of Chuang Yuan, Qian has no right to say no to Ted, but deep in her heart, she has a small wish.

She truly loves Ted. She hopes to really marry her and return to being an ordinary woman, spending her life with the man she loves, and working hard for this.

The "Sex Slave Volunteer Girl" tells the story of such a woman's life.

â—†How to play

The game is a first-person perspective AVG.
The player will play the role of the female protagonist Qian Xiangxiang and watch her spend her time in a despicable way.

â—†Game features

â—‡15 basic CGs, including more than 130 differentials.

â—‡The game text is 60,000 words.
â—‡Visual fiction game.

data.short_description: "A Sex Slave's Love Story" is a visual novel that tells the story of a girl named Qian Xiangxiang who is sold into a brothel allowed by state law and struggles to live and fight for her love in a modern-day, overhead world where the country is completely controlled by five major corporations.
data.supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Korean

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Non-Consensual Sex, Explicit Sexual Acts . All characters are over 20 years old.
